import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import "./index.css"; import { getUserInfo } from "../../services/userService"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getUserProfile } from "../../thunks/user"; const Profile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector((state) => state.user); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserProfile()); }, []); let { name, birthday, gender, race, religion, address, tel_no: telNo, hp_no: hpNo, email, school_id: schoolId, disability, } = user.profile; return (

Profile Details

Name {name} Date of Birth {birthday} Gender {gender} Race {race} Religion {religion} School ID {schoolId} Class -

Address {address} Tel No {telNo} Hp No {hpNo} Email {email} Disability Disability
); }; export default Profile;
